name: Single Room
description: A room assigned to one person. May have one or more beds The room size or area of Single Rooms are generally between 37 m² to 45 m².

name: Double Room
description: A room assigned to two people. May have one or more beds.The room size or area of Double Rooms are generally between 40 m² to 45 m².

name: King Room
description: A room with a king-sized bed. May be occupied by one or more people.The room size or area of King Rooms are generally between 32 m² to 50 m².
